abstract: Christina Iverson and Jeff Chen ring in the New Year.
lead_paragraph: WEDNESDAY PUZZLE â€” The weekend columnist Caitlin Lovinger and I work in multiple time zones when it comes to writing Wordplay. We get the crossword puzzles ahead of time so that we can balance column writing with other tasks, and the puzzle and column both appear online the night before their actual publication dates. That can make it tricky to write the column as if we are solving on the same day you are.
